swirl.description: Applies a swirling effect, useful to simulate the flow effect of liquids or gases.

params.name: radial_strength
params.description: Controls the strength of the radial component of the swirl effect.

params.name: swirl_strength
params.description: Determines the intensity of the angular distortion in the swirl.

params.name: isolation_factor
params.description: Adjusts how localized the swirl effect is within the texture.

swirl_sigmoid.description: Swirling effect with sigmoid transition for smooth blending.

params.name: radial_strength
params.description: Controls the strength of the radial component of the swirl effect.

params.name: swirl_strength
params.description: Determines the intensity of the angular distortion in the swirl.

params.name: transition_sharpness
params.description: Adjusts the sharpness of the transition effect.

params.name: transition_point
params.description: Sets the midpoint for the sigmoid transition, controlling where the transition occurs.

swirl_sigmoid_distorted.description: Combines swirling with sigmoid transitions and additional noise distortions.

params.name: radial_strength
params.description: Controls the strength of the radial component of the swirl effect.

params.name: swirl_strength
params.description: Determines the intensity of the angular distortion in the swirl.

params.name: transition_sharpness
params.description: Adjusts the sharpness of the transition effect.

params.name: transition_point
params.description: Sets the midpoint for the sigmoid transition, controlling where the transition occurs.

params.name: error_scale
params.description: Scales the effect of noise-based error on the texture coordinates.

params.name: error_threshold
params.description: Defines the threshold at which the error effect begins to apply.

params.name: error_midpoint
params.description: Sets the midpoint for the sigmoid function controlling error transitions.

params.name: error_strength
params.description: Magnifies the impact of the noise-induced error on the angular displacement.

params.name: error_speed
params.description: Modifies the speed at which the error pattern evolves over time.

offset_deriv.description: Applies a simple offset to texture coordinates based on noise derivatives.

params.name: amplitude
params.description: Controls the scale of the offset applied to texture coordinates.

infinite_mirror.description: Creates fractal-like patterns by duplicating texture elements around dynamic centers.

params.name: duplication_scale
params.description: Scales the duplication effect, affecting spatial distribution.

params.name: influence_radius
params.description: Defines the radius of influence for the effect.

params.name: non_linearity
params.description: Adjusts the non-linearity of the influence curve.

params.name: base_rotation
params.description: Controls the base intensity of the rotation effect.

params.name: time_modulation
params.description: Modulates the rotation intensity over time.

params.name: frequency
params.description: Controls the oscillation speed of the time-based rotation.
